author: [Jericho....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103491237475970207715/)
title: regenerate does not work against spell damage

comments.body:
Blight Mamba has infect, it deals damage to itself in the form of -1/-1 counters. It is moved to graveyard due to 0 toughness.

**Status:** Invalid
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [Jericho....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103491237475970207715/) on September 14, 2013 17:50:21_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. oppenent casts a damaging spell on a creature with regenerate (damage is enough to kill it)
2. regenerate the creature 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? the creature with regerate stays tapped on the battlefield.Instead it is put in the graveyard What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.41, win 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). LOG (P): Jericho may (no) take a mulligan.
LOG (C): Computer may (no) take a mulligan.
